1.title: Real Detroit Steel
1.plot: Adam's customer, Jamie, wants Mobsteel to build him a classic '63 Lincoln Continental... all black. He's been saving up for years and only trusts the Mobsteel crew to get the job done right. The guys are up to the challenge but run into trouble when they realize they'll be working under Jamie's blue-collar budget. Adam is forced to think outside the box so he can turn a profit and still deliver Jamie a true Detroit Mobsteel classic.

2.title: Chrome Dream Machine
2.plot: Mobsteel is on a mission to revive the king of American luxury, a 1953 Packard Clipper. With busted chrome, an overheating engine and peeling paint, it's going to need that Mobsteel touch. Along the way Adam and Steve explore the abandoned Packard Factory, Ron learns a new paint technique, and Doug tries to revive a monster engine. But can all that work bring this Detroit original back to its glory days?

3.title: Monster Shop Truck
3.plot: In desperate need of a new work truck for the shop, Adam must decide whether to take Pam's advice and keep it simple, or do it his way and go all-out

4.title: Puzzle of Steel
4.plot: Adam gets a surprise visit from childhood friend Chris who wants his beat up 1949 Chevy truck transformed into a retro daily driver. There's only problem: it's a pile of pieces and is missing a crucial part. Chris adds fuel to the fire when he asks the guys for a top-tier paint job and a classic wood bed on his rusty hunk of metal. Can the Mobsteel crew put the truck back together, find the missing part, and christen it with a spanking new paint job or have they bitten off more than they can chew?

5.title: Rock-n-Roll Coupe de Ville
5.plot: Local rocker Ty Stone wants a restored '58 Caddy for his upcoming music video - Mobsteel style! But will his tight timeline and unusual requests finally burnout the Mobsteel team? They need to find a '58 Caddy, fix it up, and make it rock-star-ready... in only 7 days!

6.title: Big Man Little Cab
6.plot: Mobsteel is facing their biggest challenge... all 6-foot-six of him! Regular client, and former NFL defensive lineman, Albert Haynesworth wants some custom modifications for his classic 1972 Ford truck. It will take some clever design work from the team to fit both Albert and a new racing motor on the inside, and the classic Mobsteel style on the outside.

7.title: Fastback and Furious
7.plot: Local automotive businessman Tom wants his old school Ford Fastback beefed up and ready to race. But this classic car needs a major overhaul, including a new power-packed engine, some serious suspension, and an eye catching paint job. Will Mobsteel be able deliver their classic style on this monster muscle car?

8.title: The Archangel
8.plot: Mobsteel makes a promise to deliver a classic Continental Coup to their favorite Sunday Sermon Pastor, Kelley Runion. Their challenge: make a beat-down Continental Coupe look like a million bucks... but do it on a dime. Will the team be able to stay true to the Mobsteel style without breaking the bank?

imdb.plot outline: Mobsteel is based in Detroit, Michigan. Adam and his wife Pam own the company. The shows follow an update to a client's car to be faster and better looking than when it rolled off of a production line. They make unique, sharp looking replacement wheels themselves. The talented fabricators, mechanics, and painting staff are fun to watch as they work on each car.
imdb.title: Mobsteel
